name: Bed Obsession-151
description: A bed is the central furniture in a bedroom. While relaxing, we spend most of the time on a bed. Considering the fact, obsession-151 beds are highly well-built. They are strong and durable enough to last longer.

name: Bed Sweetheart-177
description: The bed has a very plain design but looks very stylish. It has an Italian quality lacquer finishing from the best furniture brand. It is offered in antique color that makes the bed very gorgeous.

name: Bed Elegant-189
description: The excellent finishing touch with Italian grade lacquer and the use of antique color have made the surface of the bed very smooth. You will be mesmerized by touching on the wood surface of the bed.

name: Bed Myth-184
description: The bed has a smart texture due to Italian quality lacquer finishing. The antique color makes the product smarter. The tactile feeling on the wood surface of the furniture is really wonderful.

name: Bed Mirage-175
description: Simplicity is the new elegance. A bed, the prime furniture of a bedroom can be both simple and elegant. If you want to increase the beauty of your room, a smart bed can be the best choice.

name: Bed Nemesis-197
description: The bed is made from world-class Beechwood and veneered engineered wood. High-quality artificial leather and durable cushioning make this product stand out. A smart bed is best choice.

name: Bed Utopia-170
description: A bed is usually the main furniture in a bedroom. So it should be attractive. Your day starts in a bed and a fresh sleep is important for a good day. Again, a sound sleep requires a good bed. Moreover, you spend a sleepy morning and relaxing evening mostly on your bed. So, your bed should be cozy and comfortable as well.

name: Bed Hanover-188
description: A bed is a space for sleeping and relaxation. So it should ensure the comfort of a person. This is a comfy double bed from the best furniture brand in Bangladesh. So the bed is the best relaxing place for two people

name: Bed Tiara-190
description: A bed is a place for relaxation. You can sleep on it, rest on it and even roll and stretch on it for comfort. Our tiara-190 is so comfy that two people can easily relax on it without any anxiety. The bed has a high build quality.

name: Bed Aloe-196
description: Just because this bed is simple does not mean that it cannot fit into any room and suit its decor. The clean lines and high headboard of the Aloe 196 make it a handsome addition to just about any bedroom. And the top-notch, durable fabric used for the headboard will make this bed last the test of time.

name: Bedroom Juvenile-198
description: The bed cum divan set looks elegant and gives off a rich sophisticated vibe. The materials used to build this furniture is world-class and it can provide maximum warmth and relaxation. The inviting aura of this furniture will come off as appealing to everyone.

name: Bed Aries-205
description: The bed is made from world-class Beechwood and veneered engineered wood. High-quality artificial leather and durable cushioning make this product stand out. Imported hardware fittings make this bed convenient and perfect for indoor use. If youâ€™re looking for a modern bed at an affordable price, this is worth it!
